title: Template for new extensions should use the name for the docs table of contents, not a human-cased artifact ID

labels.name: area/devtools
labels.description: Issues/PR related to maven, gradle, platform and cli tooling/plugins

body:
See discussion here: https://quarkusio.zulipchat.com/#narrow/stream/187038-dev/topic/.22Quarkus.22.20word.20in.20Quarkiverse.20docs.20pages/near/359005952

George has done a batch change of existing extensions, but we're still generating old extensions with 'Quarkus' prefixed to the name in the docs. 

Without this change, we would have tables of contents like this, where ~50% of the words are "Quarkus". 

![image](https://github.com/quarkusio/quarkus/assets/11509290/ca2beba7-a6db-47d5-a4f6-625aaaa2b270)
